entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY, Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:20 a.m. MDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -8.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog

Visibility: 0.8 km

Dewpoint: -9.3°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 7.
